Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2008 05:04PM mare5135 wrote: Hi 1Cathi, Good Luck with your surgery. When I saw myself for the first time I didn't cry I was reminded of what could of been. Now I am terrified.I hope all goes well.I just cannot wait until they knock me out and wheel me away!!!!  I'll keep you all posted.....
